subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch returned to the Xfinity Series with a flourish, winning his first race back in Nascar’s second-tier series at Michigan International Speedway in Brooklyn, Mich.
snippet: Kyle Busch returned to the Xfinity Series with a flourish, winning his first race back in Nascar’s second-tier series at Michigan International Speedway in Brooklyn, Mich.
